mapper.sql: a.id as sys_dict_id, a.type_name as sys_dict_type_name, a.type_no as sys_dict_type_no, a.create_by as sys_dict_create_by, a.create_time as sys_dict_create_time, a.update_by as sys_dict_update_by, a.update_time as sys_dict_update_time, a.`status` as `sys_dict_status`, a.remark as sys_dict_remark
mapper.select:
select
from sys_dict a
a.del_flag = '1'
and a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_dict (type_name, type_no, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, `status`, def_flag, remark) values (#{type_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{create_by,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{update_by,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{update_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{def_flag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into sys_dict
type_name,
type_no,
create_by,
create_time,
update_by,
update_time,
`status`,
def_flag,
remark,
#{type_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{type_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{create_by,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{update_by,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{update_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{def_flag,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update sys_dict
type_name = #{type_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type_no = #{type_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_by = #{create_by,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{update_by,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{update_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
def_flag = #{def_flag,jdbcType=CHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_dict set type_name = #{type_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_no = #{type_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{create_by,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{update_by,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{update_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, def_flag = #{def_flag,jdbcType=CHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update sys_dict set def_flag = '0', update_time = now(), update_by = #{updateBy} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
